markdown:
**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0 **Ammunition** any **Activate**Cast a Spell --- Mystic patterns create a magic reservoir within this ammunition. You activate _spellstrike ammunition_ by Casting a Spell on the ammunition. The spell must be of a spell rank the ammunition can hold, must take 1 or 2 actions to cast, and must be able to target a creature other than the caster. A creature hit by activated spellstrike ammunition is targeted by the spell. If the creature isn't a valid target for the spell, the spell is lost.
The ammunition affects only the target hit, even if the spell would normally affect more than one target. If the spell requires a spell attack roll, use the result of your ranged attack roll to determine the degree of success of the spell. If the spell requires a save, the target attempts the save against your spell DC.
The maximum rank of spell the ammunition can hold determines its item level and Price. Spellstrike Ammunition (Type I) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 12 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 1st Spellstrike Ammunition (Type II) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 30 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 2nd Spellstrike Ammunition (Type III) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 70 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 3rd Spellstrike Ammunition (Type IV) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 150 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 4th Spellstrike Ammunition (Type V) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 300 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 5th Spellstrike Ammunition (Type VI) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 600 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 6th Spellstrike Ammunition (Type VII) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 1,300 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 7th Spellstrike Ammunition (Type VIII) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 3,000 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 8th Spellstrike Ammunition (Type IX) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 256 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 4.0 **Price** 8,000 gp --- **Maximum Spell Rank** 9th
name: Spellstrike Ammunition (Type III)
